answerText: The Frame of Government of Pennsylvania[10] This author of the Charter of Privileges and the Frame of Government founded a Quaker state that has a capitol at Harrisburg.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 15 | 6 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The preface to this text compares governments to clocks since both are set in motion and destroyed by men. For 10 points each: [10] Name this 1682 text that says that having good men is better than having good laws. Its fourth version was called the Charter of Privileges.
